description: This Dart source file defines environment configuration keys and a class for loading and accessing environment variables in a Flutter application. It manages loading the .env file, retrieving string and boolean values, and exposing specific environment parameters via static getters.

classes.name: EnvKeys
classes.description: Contains static constants for environment variable keys used throughout the app.

classes.name: EnvConfig
classes.description: Provides methods to load environment variables and exposes configurations via static getters.

methods.name: ensureLoaded
methods.description: Loads the .env file asynchronously if it hasn't been loaded already.

methods.name: getString
methods.description: Retrieves a string value for a given key from the environment, with an optional default.

methods.name: getBool
methods.description: Interprets environment variable values as boolean flags.
